<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Subscribe to the Store events"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/store/subscribe"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add subscription for a store events

      label={"POST orderInProgress"}
      value={"post-orderInProgress"}

        method={"post"}
        path={"{$request.body#/callbackUrl}?event={$request.body#/eventName}"}
        context={"callback"}
      >
        
      </MethodEndpoint>
      
      
      
      A callback triggered every time an Order is updated status to "inProgress" (Description)

        {...require("./subscribe-to-the-store-events.RequestSchema.2.json")}

        context={"callback"}
      >
        
      </MethodEndpoint>

        {...require("./subscribe-to-the-store-events.RequestSchema.3.json")}
      >

      <MethodEndpoint
        method={"post"}
        path={"{$request.body#/callbackUrl}?event={$request.body#/eventName}"}
        context={"callback"}
      >
        
      </MethodEndpoint>
      
      
      
      A callback triggered every time an Order is shipped to the recipient
      
      <RequestSchema
        {...require("./subscribe-to-the-store-events.RequestSchema.4.json")}
      >
        
      </RequestSchema>

      </StatusCodes>

      label={"POST orderDelivered"}
      value={"post-orderDelivered"}
    >
      <MethodEndpoint
        method={"post"}
        path={"http://notificationServer.com?url={$request.body#/callbackUrl}&event={$request.body#/eventName}"}
        context={"callback"}
      >
        
      </MethodEndpoint>
      
      
      
      A callback triggered every time an Order is delivered to the recipient

        {...require("./subscribe-to-the-store-events.RequestSchema.5.json")}
